amendment.description: To reduce the amount authorized to be appropriated for each of the fiscal years.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4190 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4190 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Stevens. (consideration: CR S5511; text: CR S5511) To reduce the amount authorized to be appropriated for each of the fiscal years.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4190 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Stevens.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4190 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
